title: Christian praiers and holie meditations as wel for priuate as publique exercise: gathered out of the most godly learned in our time, by Henrie Bull. Whereunto are added the praiers, commonly called Lidleys praiers.
author: Bull, Henry, d. 1575?
publisher: Printed by R. Robinson, for S. Waterson. and N. Ling,
notes: Includes, with caption title, "A godlie instruction, conteining the summe of all the divinitie necessary for a Christian conscience".
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
